name: The Selfridge

reviews.title: nothing special but not as bad as reviews led me to think
reviews.text: Was staying overnight as attending a conference in the hotel the following day and had decided to stay here to save travel time on the day of the conference.

reviews.title: Incompetent Staff
reviews.text: I have to say based on the reviews here I was a little wary but I found the staff ok and whilst my single room was small it was clean tidy and had a reasonable bathroom. Not sure how this would be in the summer though with no air con.

description: Closed for renovation. Due to reopen in 2010.
